FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo seduto sopra un masso, il torso visto quasi di fianco, il braccio destro appoggiato a un'asta, il sinistro sopra un libro, la testa vista di dietro

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude youth seated on block, his torso seen almost sideways, with right arm stretched out and resting on staff, his left on a book, the head seen from behind
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: The modelling is truly splendid, and the effect of colour almost unsurpassable. This also may have been done in connection with Poggio a Cajano.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo seduto sulla base di un albero, al quale si appoggia con la mano destra mentre con la sinistra si tiene una ciotola alla bocca

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude youth lightly seated on branch, on which he leans with right hand, while with left he holds bowl to his mouth
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: This delightful nude is of the quality and style of the drawings for Poggio a Cajano, and probably was intended for a Baptist in the Wilderness.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo con gli occhi stravolti, seduto con le gambe divaricate, che accenna a sinistra

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Male nude with mad eyes, lightly seated with legs wide apart, pointing to left. Probably for Poggio a Cajano

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo virile seduto per terra, con il ginocchio destro alzato e la gamba sinistra flessa sul terreno, sul quale egli si appoggia con la mano sinistra facendo solecchio agli occhi con la destra in direzione capovolta, vago accenno del busto della stessa figura. Il nudo a sanguigna, l'accenno del busto a carboncino

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Scarabocchio grezzo di un torso

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude squatting on ground, with right leg bent at knee and raised, the left folded back on ground, left hand resting on ground, right shading eyes
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Both these are variations upon my 202, and like that were intended for Poggio a Cajano, probably for the shepherd on the ground to the left

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Rough scrawl of torso

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo di lunghezza favolosa visto quasi da tergo, col dorso della mano destra appoggiato sopra un tavolo

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude youth of fabulous length seen from behind, with back of left hand resting on table, and right hand held out
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Latish.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo seduto in profilo a destra su tre scalini con la mano sinistra tesa (studio per il medesimo San Giovanni che ritroviamo su BB n. 1978) un altro giovane seduto. Ambedue disegnati a carboncino sopra diversi scarabocchi a sanguigna

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Due nudi visti di fianco seduti sui calcagni

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude youth seated sideways to right with left hand held out, a study for the same composition for a St. John that we find in my 1978. Another seated youth. Both drawn in black chalk over various scrawls in red chalk
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: All fairly early

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Two nudes seen sideways seated on their heels

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Cinque nudi virili, michelangioleschi e al tempo stesso antichi, stanno in piedi presso un fuoco: uno tira fuori qualcosa da un sacco tenuto da un altro, come se tirasse a sorte, mentre tiene un libro nella mano destra varie figure gesticolanti nello sfondo

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Highly finished design for a composition. Five Michelangelesque and at once antique nudes stand by a fire. One takes something out of a bag held by another as if to draw lots, while in his right hand he holds a book. Several gesticulating figures in background
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: It is for iconographers to say what this may mean. As a composition it is beautiful, and exhales delightful suggestions. The date may be about 1535 or later. A comparison with Pollajuolo's nudes helps us to measure the distance travelled by the art of the Renaissance in about 70 years.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo virile seduto di lato verso destra e vaghi accenni di un altro nudo

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Giovane nudo in profilo a destra che si appoggia a un parapetto, mostrando gran parte delle spalle. Di qualità incantevole

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Youthful nude seated sideways to right, and vaguer nude
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: As Clapp (Life, fig. 6) points out, the sketch on the recto is for a woman seated on the steps to left in the Annunziata Visitation. A most interesting somewhat Raphaelesque version of it used to be in the Geiger Collection.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Youthful nude of most charming quality standing sideways, showing most of back. His hands rest on parapet

BB_1903_recto.BB_1903_text_recto: Both were probably for Poggio a Cajano.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo virile seduto con la testa e le gambe in profilo a sinistra, su un cubo al quale si appoggia con la mano sinistra, mentre addita con l'altra mano lo spettatore

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Nudo femminile visto da tergo

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude figure sitting on block pressing it down with left hand while pointing to right, although facing to left
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: The attitude recalls Michelangelo's decorative nudes on the Sixtine Ceiling. The quality is excellent. Perhaps it is Pontormo's best sketch in black chalk. As it is more mannered than the sketches that can positively be connected with the Poggio a Cajano fresco, it may have been intended for the lunette that was not executed.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Female nude seen from behind

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo disteso sul fianco sinistro visto da tergo

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Reclining nude seen from behind
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Late.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Grasso nudo maschile visto da tergo col braccio destro piegato attorno alla testa, ed il sinistro flesso al gomito e portato all'altezza delle spalle

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Fat male nude seen from behind with right arm curved around head, and left doubled up from elbow
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Michelangelesque in motive, and late.

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo di brutte proporzioni in profilo a sinistra

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude of bad proportions seen sideways
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Late.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo che ne sorregge un altro

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude supporting another. The latter recalls my 2066 and 2069, and this drawing must have served same purpose as those

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Cristo seduto, in una mandorla di nudi, con le mani aperte a benedire: in basso, l'Eterno che fa uscire Eva dalla costola di Adamo dormiente
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: Same as 1938 and 1938 Title, in Italian

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Christ seated with hands held out in midst of various nudes, all caricatures of Michelangelo. Below the Christ an old man, representing the Eternal, is calling to life Eve from under the sleeping Adam
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Certainly for S. Lorenzo. There is a touch of Blake in all this.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo che sembra scendere da una roccia, colla gamba sinistra allungata e la destra di scorcio, il braccio destro ricadente lungo il fianco e il sinistro proteso

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude youth seen as if climbing down from rock with left leg stretched out and right foreshortened, right arm falling to side and left stretched out
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: According to Clapp (Dessins, p. 184) about 1520.

BB_1903_recto.BB_1903_text_recto: This was suggested by the dead Christ in Andrea's famous "Pietà" now in the Pitti and doubtless was intended for a similar subject.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Studio per un Cristo Morto
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: Same as 1938, in Italian except the reference to BB n. 2486 "da me data a Sebastiano del Piombo"

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Piccolo schizzo di un nudo maschile nella stessa posa del recto, schizzo separato della testa e delle braccia per la stessa figura e schizzo per le gambe e l'addome di un torso maschile

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Study for Dead Christ
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: At first sight it might seem as if Pontormo while drawing this interesting sketch had in mind the famous Warwick design for a Pietà (now in the British Museum, my 2486) ascribed to Michelangelo or indeed that master's original jotting for this design. The purpose of the action in the two figures is almost identical, although Pontormo betrays that he does not quite understand what he is doing. If he had, perhaps he would not have drawn back the left leg. This is so uncalled for that I cannot help thinking that what he really had in mind was not the Warwick Pietà or its predecessors, but the attitude and action of Michelangelo's - singular adaptation! - Leda.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Small sketch of male nude in same attitude as on recto, one for head and arms and another for legs and abdomen of male torso

BB_1903_recto.BB_1903_text_recto: Same as 1938 and added: Now if really Pontormo drew this sketch in connection with the “Pietà” in the Accademia (with the dead Christ in which it has considerable resemblance), then we should have to grant, what we know was not the fact, that he had never delved deep into the most precious secrets of form and action. In the painting there remains of the motive the silhouette only. The chest, instead of being arched so as to exhibit all the play of bone, muscle and tendon, has become a box. All the ambrosial relaxation has left it, and given place to mere motionlessness, and the fact of death

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane nudo appoggiato col braccio sinistro a una stampella

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude youth leaning on crutch which he holds under his left elbow. A delightful early study for Poggio a Cajano perhaps, or indeed for a St. Christopher of the same period

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane uomo seduto a gambe aperte con un drappo intorno alla vita e un rotolo nella mano destra, la sinistra alzata con gesto declamatorio e lo sguardo volto a sinistra con espressione ispirata
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: [1957: Quando il Clapp propose di collegare questo schizzo con uno dei Patriarchi, ora distrutti, nella volta della Cappella Capponi in Santa Felicita (1526-28), io non fui d'accordo con lui, perché mi sembrava di data più giovanile; ma oggi gli do ragione e sono grato a Miss Janet Cox per aver dimostrato in Burlington Magazine, Gennaio 1956, p. 17 seg., fig. 17, che si tratta proprio di uno studio per uno di quei Patriarchi.];

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Nudo in profilo e studi per la parte inferiore di un nudo virile

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Admirable study for draped figure seated on ground with legs wide apart, the right hand with scroll in it resting on parapet, left held up as if reciting. He looks to left with an inspired expression. The attitude recalls my 2089, and like that, this sketch may have been done for Poggio a Cajano but for the lunette that was never executed

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Nudes and legs, slight
BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_text_verso: Clapp (Life, fig. 98) wants to connect these with S. Felicita but they seem to me earlier.

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Testa femminile

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Torso of youth in profile to right, with hand held up to chin. Perhaps for one of the Evangelists in the Capponi Chapel at S. Felicita
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Done in the most extraordinary technique with bistre on a ground rubbed with black chalk, resulting in a freedom and force that are not easily surpassed in Renaissance draughtsmanship. Indeed we are reminded of the Japanese and certain recent French men.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Female head, possibly for the Madonna in the Pietà at S. Felicita

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Figura acefala drappeggiata, seduta, con le mani giunte

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Leggero schizzo di figura in corsa e prospettiva lineare di due porte; nell'angolo superiore destro, schizzo di una porta che ci ricorda quella nell'affresco della Certosa che raffigura "Cristo nell'Orto"

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Headless seated figure, with clasped hands, draped
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: The folds are of purely Northern character, and here we have witness to Pontormo's attempt at adopting not only the ideas but the manner of Dürer. Doubtless for some figure in the Certosa frescoes.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Slight sketch of figure running and perspective outline of two gates; in right upper corner sketch of gate reminding us of the one in the Certosa fresco representing Christ in the garden

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Grazioso giovinetto nudo e studio di una coscia di tre quarti verso destra
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: Same as 1938, in Italian and added: [1957: Luisa Vertova ha giustamente rilevato che il giovinetto sul recto è uno studio preparatorio per la "Madonna con San Giovannino" o "Carità" (Uffizi n. 4347), databile appunto in quegli anni.]

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Studio più vago di un nudo acefalo, seduto di fronte e studi di cosce

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude pretty youth sitting sideways
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Soon after S. Felicita.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Vaguer study of nude seated facing us

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo giacente sul fianco destro, visto di spalle, ma con la testa di fronte in un atteggiamento che somiglia a qualcuna delle figure inferiori del "Giudizio Universale" di Michelangelo una altra testa ritoccata a penna

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Reclining nude seen sideways, but with head facing, in attitude resembling some of lower figures in Michelangelo's Last Judgement. Another head touched up with pen

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Ragazzo a cavalcioni di un muricciolo, in atto di tirare su qualcosa con la mano sinistra

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Dashing study of boy straddling parapet while pulling up something with left hand
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: This motive betrays, what otherwise we might not have suspected, that the idea of these putti for Poggio a Cajano came to Pontormo from Michelangelo's nude lads in the Sixtine Ceiling.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Un giovinetto nudo, con la testa in profilo a destra, sta in piedi guardando un oggetto che tiene nella mano destra

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Studio più rapido e probabilmente più tardo del recto, di un giovane dall'aspetto selvaggio in atto di trattenere con ambo le mani vicino alla testa un panneggio investito dal vento

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude youth with head in profile to right stands looking at object in right hand
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Very powerful contours, as if undercut in bronze, yet of marvellous effect as colour. Perhaps done after Michelangelo's bozzetto for the David of c. 1517.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: More rapid and probably later study of wild-looking youth fluttering behind him a drapery which he holds with both hands close to his head

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovane uomo drappeggiato che avanza verso destra

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Sketch for angel in fresco of the Annunciation at S. Felicita

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Torso di uomo seduto in profilo a destra col braccio che gli nasconde il volto

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Torso turned to left with arm hiding face
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Late.

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo maschile seduto verso destra visto da tergo

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Frate visto di fronte fino ai ginocchi con le braccia pendenti ai lati

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Male nude seated sideways seen from behind
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Clapp (Life, figs. 82,84, and Dessins, p. 209) has proved that both these sketches are for the Supper at Emmaus.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Friar standing and facing front with both arms hanging down

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo virile in profilo a destra ma in atto di volgerci la nuca, con una spada nella mano destra e il braccio sinistro teso davanti a sé nell'angolo superiore sinistro studio separato della sua spalla

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude in profile, but head turned away. He has a sword in his right hand, and his left arm is held out
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Clapp (Dessins, p. 210) has connected this with the Nailing on the Cross, planned for the Certosa.

BB_1903_recto.BB_1903_text_recto: This study may have been intended for an executioner in a Judgment of Solomon.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Due nudi semigenuflessi, ciascuno con la testa nella mano e lo sguardo sognante

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Two seated Nudes, each with his head in his hand looking up as if in reverie

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Torso e braccio di figura volta in basso a sinistra

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Nudo virile in violento contrapposto

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Torso and arm of figure looking down to left

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Nude figure in violent contrapposto

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Schizzo rapido ma magistrale di un nudo maschile adagiato all'indietro, col braccio destro alzato che nasconde a metà il volto disegnato parzialmente al disopra di questo, altro schizzo eloquente di un nudo in posa analoga, ma visto più di fronte scarabocchi di una spalla e di un fanciullo

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Progetto per la lunetta di Poggio a Caiano: due figure giovanili (le stesse studiate negli schizzi sul recto) si appoggiano al vertice della finestra rotonda reggendo le insegne; in mezzo a loro uno stemma; ai lati inferiori della finestra, vaga indicazione di due figure; al di fuori di questo schema, rapido schizzo di due putti avvinghiati dorso contro dorso, e studio molto più deciso di due putti gagliardamente avvinti, in piedi sopra un piedistallo iscritto Jacopo da Pontormo

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Rapid bust masterly sketch of male nude leaning backward, with right arm held up and half hiding face. Partly drawn over this, an equally telling sketch of a nude seen more form the front. Also scrawl of a shoulder, and of a child. All for Poggio a Cajano

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Mapping out of the lunette at Poggio a Cajano. Youthful figures, for which the two on the front were sketches, lean against the top of the round window holding ensigns. Between them a panoply. Near the window below, vague indication of a figure on either side. The outside this scheme, rapid sketch of the two putti back to back, and more firm, indeed very decisive study of two putti clinging sturdily one to the other, and standing on a pedestal. Both these groups of putti are imitations of those Michelangelo placed on the pedestals in his Sixtine frescoes. The mapping out in black chalk, the figures in red chalk

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Ragazzo nudo a cavalcioni di un ramo di lauro

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Putto striding laurel bush, earlier and more spirited version of my 2017A, and like that done in connection with the frescoes at Poggio a Cajano

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Angioletto reggi-cortina col braccio sinistro alzato a destra ripetizione di una parte della stessa figura

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Nudo maschile seduto verso sinistro su un ripiano al quale si appoggia con la mano sinistra e la destra tesa in fuori; in basso, perpendicolarmente al nudo, testa di fanciullo

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Masterly, vigorous sketch for the child angel on our right in the S. Michele altar-piece. Repetition of part of same figure

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Seated male nude, with right hand pressing down on bench, and left held out. Child's head. Done perhaps for same work before it took final shape

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: San Girolamo nudo inginocchiato in penitenza

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude St. Jerome kneeling in penitence. Poorer version of my 1968

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo virile sproporzionalmente allungato nella posa del Cristo in atto di essere inchiodato sulla croce (a carboncino acquarellato con biacca e rosa chiaro) in direzione rovesciata un busto dalla testa più giovanile, col braccio destro alzato tracciato rapidamente, senza dubbio per lo stesso scopo (a sanguigna) nell'angolo inferiore sinistro, rifinito studio dal vero per la sola testa del Cristo, incollato dal Pontormo stesso (a sanguigna)
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: Same as 1938, in Italian and added: Vedi anche BB n. 2159 recto.

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Study in black chalk and wash for disproportionately long figure of Christ in attitude of being nailed to cross. Also in reverse direction a more youthful head with right arm stretched up, no doubt for same purpose. The bust and right arm are drawn in red chalk roughly, and the head alone more elaborately, and from the model
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: This sketch certainly served for the fine composition representing the Nailing to the Cross for which my 2159A gives us the design.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Busto di giovane nudo dalla faccia lunga e dagli occhi fissi

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Panneggio per un torso col braccio sinistro sull'anca

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude bust of youth with long face and staring round eyes

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Drapery for torso with left arm akimbo

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Ritratto a mezza figura di un ragazzo col corpo volto a sinistra ma col viso girato verso lo spettatore a destra, schizzo più piccolo per l'azione della testa, capo grazioso e delicato come un fiore

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Nudo virile e studio di una sottana che lascia scoperta una gamba destra penzolante

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Study for portrait of boy seen from side but turning face towards us. Smaller sketch for the action of head, very graceful and flowerlike

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Studies for nude and for cast of drapery

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Testa di uomo sui trent'anni o più, con la barba corta ed il volto consunto, espressivo, in profilo a sinistra

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Sommario profilo a sinistra di uomo giovanile

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Head of a man of thirty or more, with short beard, and worn, expressive face in profile to left
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Both these profiles have an almost Holbeinesque precision.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: More summary profile to left of youngish man

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Quattro putti in atteggiamenti diversi, due dei quali visibili solo in parte

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Putto seduto per terra verso destra, con la gamba destra piegata al ginocchio e la gamba sinistra distesa e studi separati delle sue membra

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Four putti in various attitudes, two of them only partly visible
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: These sketches may have served for the charming putto in the foreground of Pontormo's Annunziata fresco. They were all done probably from the model which was rapidly sketched in various attitudes more and more approaching the one in the painting. The quality of the drawing, so singularly angular and yet so fluent, has never been surpassed by our artist. Clapp (see Dessins, p. 219) connects them with the drawings for Poggio with which indeed they have more in common. It is interesting to note that the attitudes remain nearer to Andrea while the technique has already left him behind.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Putto seated on ground, with right hand on it and left leg stretched out

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo virile addormentato e studio separato della sua testa

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Studio più rapido per la stessa figura del recto

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Fine study of sleeping figure and of head of same, for Dead Christ for which my 2174, 2175 verso, 2175A also served

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: More rapid study of same figure

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Inchiodamento di Cristo sulla Croce
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: Same as 1938 and 1938 Title, in Italian

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Arched composition for fresco, the lower right corner of which overhangs door. It represents, in many small figures, Christ being nailed to the cross, and is interesting as an arrangement, full of freakishness and originality. It is squared for enlarging and was planned for the Certosa but never executed
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: See in connection with it my 1972A, 2148, 2159, 2171, 2174, 2175A, 2177.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Numerosi piccoli nudi per una composizione raffigurante il Ratto delle Sabine

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Numerous small nudes for composition representing the rape of the Sabines. Very close to Andrea, and quite early
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: It seems to me now (1934) nearer to Michelangelo, particularly the two straggling groups to our right.

BB_1903_recto.BB_1903_text_recto: Very close to Andrea, and quite early

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Giovinetta seduta verso sinistra con le gambe allungate sul terreno, a destra di una finestra
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: Same as 1938 and 1938 Title, in Italian

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Donna semisdraiata che si appoggia al gomito sinistro con le gambe allungate sul terreno

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Study for reclining shepherdess, the one next to the window on our right in the lunette at Poggio a Cajano
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Both are free and powerful as draughtsmanship. This one seems a more elaborated version of my 2020 verso.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Study for reclining shepherdess to right of the one for which the last is study

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Mezza figura di nudo giovanile dai capelli ricciuti, appoggiato sul gomito destro e volto leggermente verso sinistra

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Half-length figure of curly-headed youthful nude leaning on right elbow and looking out a little to left. Perhaps study for one of the Evangelists in the Capponi Chapel at S. Felicita

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: A sinistra un cavaliere, a destra una specie di vecchia Sibilla che lo addita a un giovane, nel mezzo del foglio un groviglio di figure, quelle in primo piano stese a terra bocconi, quelle nello sfondo simili a lancieri a cavallo
BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_text_recto: Same as 1938, in Italian and added: Per il cavaliere vedi anche BB n. 2205 e BB n. 2023, per le figure bocconi vedi anche BB n. 2021 verso. [1958: Sia questo, sia gli studi di cavaliere su BB n. 2205, si riferiscono allo sfondo dell'"Epifania" dipinta dal Pontormo intorno al 1517-18 e ora a Pitti.]

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Old sibyl pointing out to a knight a youthful cavalier on horseback
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: The rider occurs in the Martyrdom of St. Maurice, and the entire sketch may have been made while Pontormo was preparing for enlarging that picture. The study is of remarkable pictorial effect, energetic and yet graceful giving us a slight foretaste of Greco.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo virile seduto su uno sgabello verso destra, con la gamba destra ritratta, ed un'asta nella mano destra

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Esile nudo virile seduto, appoggiato come a ripiano di tavola e due rapidi schizzi di un busto di vecchio

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Elderly nude seated, looking to right, with right leg drawn back, holding staff in right hand
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: The purpose of this sheet is unknown to me. Early.

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Slender nude lightly seated, and two rapid sketches of old man's head

BB_1903_recto.BB_1903_text_recto: Same as 1938 and added: Possibly it may have been done in connection with Poggio a Cajano.

FlorentineDrawingsProject.Collection_main: Gabinetto disegni e stampe degli Uffizi

BB_1961_recto.BB_1961_title_recto: Nudo inginocchiato a sinistra in atteggiamento di preghiera, che regge un'asta nella mano destra in basso lo stesso modello disteso

BB_1961_verso.BB_1961_title_verso: Tre giovani nudi distesi, uno dei quali accenna con la mano sinistra

BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_title_recto: Nude kneeling to left in attitude of prayer, holding staff in closed right hand, his left drawn back and below the same model reclining
BB_1938_recto.BB_1938_text_recto: Very likely as Clapp suggests (Dessins, p. 227) for an Adoration of the Shepherds

BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_title_verso: Three youthful nudes reclining, one of theme pointing with his left hand
BB_1938_verso.BB_1938_text_verso: Excellent. Several years later than the recto, the principal figure distinctly "Michelangelo-Raphaelesque".

BB_1903_recto.BB_1903_text_recto: This is perhaps a study for a "Pietà", the dead Christ for which we have in n. 2174.
